headline: Strengths School™ Unites Asia's Top HR Leaders at Inaugural Conference in Hong Kong Unlocking Peak Employee Engagement with Strengths-Based Strategies
summary: Strengths School™, Singapore's trusted provider of strengths-based training, successfully hosted its inaugural HR conference on 7 November. The event, hosted by Jason Ho, Founder of Strengths School™, gathered distinguished HR directors and senior managers, talent management, and L&D leaders across Asia from notable brands including Deloitte, Lululemon and Swire Properties, in an insightful exploration of strength-based practices that boost employee engagement in workplaces.
